ingredients: 2   +   1/2 cups apples - peeled, cored, and sliced, 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened
nutrition: Total Fat 16g 20%, Saturated Fat 10g 49%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 207mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 56g 20%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 38g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 2mg 11%, Calcium 13mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 77mg 2%
